data.eml:eml: On the Planopilumnidae Serène, 1984 (Crustacea: Brachyura: Pseudozioidea), with diagnoses of two new pilumnoid genera for species previously assigned to Planopilumnus Balss, 1933

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ng, Peter K. L. (2010): On the Planopilumnidae Serène, 1984 (Crustacea: Brachyura: Pseudozioidea), with diagnoses of two new pilumnoid genera for species previously assigned to Planopilumnus Balss, 1933. Zootaxa 2392: 33-61, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.275841
